status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: This integration could be very cool with a "weight" attribute to manage item order and binding to the delete/remove function for items in the Collection when they are edited in the DashboardView.

comments.body:
I'm going to mark this resolved as a duplicate. Once ALOY-500 is closed, you'll be able to see the models/binding_dashboard demo app for application of a weight factor for reordering items on the Dashboard. I think that ticket covers what you're asking for.

BTW, that demo app works despite TIMOB-13649.
